title: Slayer and Zombie skins Launch Update
body: The store is broken after updating for the slayer and zombie skins. Please fix

replies.body: Store still broken and sometimes can't even log into client.  It has to retry over and over again.  Is this issue not affecting more people for Riot to not notice?  Is it because it only affects people using windows 7 like me and everyone else upgraded to windows 10 or something? I want to buy skins:(

Hey VaIhaIla,

Are you still experiencing this?

**EDIT**: Based on the comments, looks like this may be an issue still. I've let the store team know!
I think few of us are experiencing this.. and I am one of them. Client is very laggy and store doesn't work..
Im experienceing the same problem been over 40 min now cant log into game and when i do it doesnt let me play any games, happened after buying a new skin
Same Problem.CANT OPEN STORE AFTER THE UPDATE. PLEASE FIX. I WANT THE NEW SKINS.{{champion:32}}

I can't even Log in after i made this patch xD
stcuk in "logging on" for few mins .. before the "connection failure" shows xD

I am as well, the store wont load at all its just a  black screen.

You guys are really on the ball here with this event aren't ya?
Having the same issue.... Can't buy anything. Went to buy RP & some skins/champs and it wont load or even show an error. Can play games fine though.
